problem.markdown:
>>In the the case of defibrillator, a double square pulse type is used to<< ( ) restart the heart rhythm after the open heart surgery ( ) arrest ventricular fibrillation ( ) arrest leakage of blood from the heart ( ) arrest the reverse flow of blood from ventricle to atrium
>>In direct current defibrillator, a pulse with a duration of about 5 ms is generated by means of a<< ( ) astable multivibrator ( ) monostable multivibrator ( ) clock IC 555 ( ) capacitor discharge
>>The energy produced by defibrillator is<< ( ) 400 J ( ) 0 .1 J ( ) 10,000 J ( ) 100,000 J
>>Let-go currents are<< ( ) same for men and women ( ) same for all frequencies ( ) higher for men than women ( ) higher for persons having enormous weight
>>One of the following properties is the characteristic of metals when they are used as implant materials. What is it?<< ( ) high impact tensile strength ( ) corrosion resistance ( ) inert to body fluids ( ) easy to fabricate
problem.p: In the the case of defibrillator, a double square pulse type is used to

choicegroup.label: In the the case of defibrillator, a double square pulse type is used to
choicegroup.choice: restart the heart rhythm after the open heart surgery
arrest leakage of blood from the heart
arrest the reverse flow of blood from ventricle to atrium

Let-go currents are
choicegroup.choice: higher for persons having enormous weight

problem.p: One of the following properties is the characteristic of metals when they are used as implant materials. What is it?
